rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or an established patient?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient states their status (new or established)

rules.title: Request Identifying Information
rules.action: Request identifying information (e.g., phone number or date of birth) to pull up their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Acknowledge ID and State Next Step
rules.action: Acknowledge receipt and state the next step (e.g., 'pulling up your chart').
rules.example: Thank you. Pulling up your chart now.

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Details
rules.action: Confirm the appointment reason and inquire about preferred office location.
rules.example: I see your chart. What is the reason for your visit today, and which office location do you prefer?

rules.title: Inquire About Preferred Doctor
rules.condition: After confirming office location for an established patient
rules.action: Ask the patient if they have a preferred doctor.
rules.example: Do you have a preferred doctor you'd like to see?

rules.title: Collect New Patient Details
rules.action: Collect personal details (e.g., name, date of birth, phone number) and insurance information.
rules.example: Welcome! To get started, please provide your full name, date of birth, phone number, and insurance details.

rules.title: Provide Last Visit Date
rules.condition: Patient asks for the date of their last visit
rules.action: Provide the date of the patient's last visit.

rules.title: Confirm Staff Identity
rules.condition: Patient asks about staff changes or a specific staff member
rules.action: Attempt to confirm the staff member's identity.
rules.example: Could you please tell me the name of the staff member you are asking about, so I can confirm?
